title: Drop in FPS
body: I have had crazy FPS drops like a sinking {{champion:54}} in water. This was never an issue before till  the last several patches.  I don't know what it is cause my CPU, ping, internet connection is all fine except FPS.

replies.body:
Let's get a {{champion:267}}  Q on you and get you back on your feet!  Sudden FPS issues can happen for a few reasons, like outdated drivers.  More recently, a recent Windows 10 update enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has caused some FPS issues.  Try disabling that as your first step!

If the issue persists, give our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide a go to rule out possibilities with your drivers and other settings on your PC.  Let me know if you have any questions!
